name: FinancialResourceStrainStatus
title: Financial Resource Strain Status
description: Ability to pay for basic necessities such as food, housing, medical care, etc. (Business ID: Entry 2729865)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Financial Resource Strain Status.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an ability to pay for basic necessities such as food, housing, medical care, etc..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Financial Resource Strain Status.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Financial Resource Strain Status.)

contains.display: You don't have enough money to buy the things you or your kids need [PhenX]
How hard is it for you to pay for the very basics like food, housing, medical care, and heating
Have you or any family members you live with been unable to get any of the following when it was really needed in past 1 year [PRAPARE]
Do you have trouble paying for your gas or electricity bills [WellRx]
